Endemic areas would greatly benefit from more cost-effective and efficient YF assays to control YF infection
4 . These could prevent outbreaks not only in endemic countries, but also in other territories visited by travelers coming from endemic areas
4 . Unfortunately, serological diagnostic methods are not very accurate due the low levels of circulating immunoglobulins and the high rate of cross-reactions between arboviruses in serology. Thus, having access to a faster differential diagnosis can help to implement the correct treatment and preventive measures
